metadata.Title: CVE-2022-47951 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in OpenStack Cinder before 19.1.2, 20.x before 20.0.2, and 21.0.0; Glance before 23.0.1, 24.x before 24.1.1, and 25.0.0; and Nova before 24.1.2, 25.x before 25.0.2, and 26.0.0. By supplying a specially created VMDK flat image that references a specific backing file path, an authenticated user may convince systems to return a copy of that file's contents from the server, resulting in unauthorized access to potentially sensitive data.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47951` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cinder-api - 2:16.4.2-0ubuntu2.1
cinder-backup - 2:16.4.2-0ubuntu2.1
cinder-common - 2:16.4.2-0ubuntu2.1
cinder-scheduler - 2:16.4.2-0ubuntu2.1
cinder-volume - 2:16.4.2-0ubuntu2.1
python3-cinder - 2:16.4.2-0ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

glance - 2:20.2.0-0ubuntu1.1
glance-api - 2:20.2.0-0ubuntu1.1
glance-common - 2:20.2.0-0ubuntu1.1
python3-glance - 2:20.2.0-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

nova-ajax-console-proxy - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-api - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-api-metadata - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-api-os-compute - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-api-os-volume - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-cells - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-common - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-compute - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-compute-kvm - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-compute-libvirt - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-compute-lxc - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-compute-qemu - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-compute-vmware - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-compute-xen - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-conductor - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-novncproxy - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-scheduler - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-serialproxy - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-spiceproxy - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
nova-volume - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
python3-nova - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

advisory.DiscoveredBy:
Guillaume Espanel, Pierre Libeau, Arnaud Morin and
Damien Rannou

notes.Note: mdeslaur> image conversion was introduced in glance 17.0.0, so bionic and earlier are not vulnerable.

criterions.comment: cinder package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:16.4.2-0ubuntu2.1').
glance package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:20.2.0-0ubuntu1.1').
nova package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.1').
